description:
On this episode of HEY DT:

0:00 Intro
0:19 What was the first Linux distro that you used?
2:29 Do you earn $$$ when your video is creative commons?
3:50 Could you do a video series about configuring Neovim like you did with Emacs?
5:10 Do you know an easy to use folder sync tool like OneDrive on Windows?
6:22 You should make video about how some linux distros track user activity too...? soo ?
8:44 What is your favorite Linux command?
9:56 You make me love Linux. I have always wanted to switch to Mac but...
10:33 I think I figured out what your super secure password is. It's "**".
10:52 I'd like to hear your thoughts on banning Russians from contributing to the kernel.
17:11 Thanks to the Patrons!

WANT TO SUPPORT THE CHANNEL?
💰 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dist
title: Hey, DT! I Figured Out Your Password. (It's **)
